resources.string: This single-use code will be usable for 48 hours.
The location permission is disabled in settings.
The camera permission is disabled in settings.
Search for places, services, and more
Tap on the map to set the location of this page.
This message is shown on the page below the name
This message is shown when someone chooses \"%1$s\"
Your current transfer code will no longer work.
Email this code to yourself or keep it somewhere where you won\'t lose it!\n\nYou will need this transfer code to regain access to your account after signing out.
I understand that I need my transfer code in order to use this account again.
If you sign out without a transfer code you will permanently lose access to your account!
The message will be removed for everyone in the group.
The location of this page will be updated to your current location every time you open the app.
Show open groups that I\'m a member of
Group hidden until new messages are sent
This page will only be discoverable by its link.
It looks like you\'ve been signed out.
%1$s invited you to play Hi Town together! Download the app from https://hitown.chat and use invite code %2$s.
No pages nearby. All pages within 100km of you will be shown here.
The QR code of a page can be viewed from the page\'s menu.
Tap and hold stickers to find sticker packs.
The maximum size of a sticker is 500kb
Sticker pack could not be found
Add a location to share your post with people nearby (optional)
Share your post at time of publishing (optional)
There\'s nothing to read.\n\nMaybe write something?
Create a sticker pack and share it with friends.
That URL is already in use
You are using the latest version
I have a concern for someone\'s safety
This should not be here, brings me down, or otherwise makes me unhappy
This looks like spam or is fake
Data export includes your profile, pages, and posts.
Enable anonymous replies from the web
This will replace the current photo.
The page will be updated when the photo is generated.\n\nPage title, hint, and details are shared with a 3rd party.
Anyone will be able to discover this group, see all members, messages, and request to become a member.
This group will only be accessible to members.
Hi Town doesn\'t have permission to do that.
Are you sure you want to link this device?
This widget is currently only interactable on web.
Form submissions will be created under this page:
Let people recognize you out in town.
Share anything else you\'d like to say.
Here\'s what you can do in town.
Gather friends and make things happen! Or open your group to new friends.
Express your true self! Keep the town interesting and lively.
Let people get to know you better with pages covering all of your ambitions.
There\'s so much more for the adventurous!
Downgrade this page to %1$s and recover %2$s?
Discover and post pages in your town.
Check if this item can be divided by a fraction.
Describe how this item can be used.
Hi Town is sharing your screen
Who sends messages to this group?
Add a comment to your reaction
You will get points to spend on upgrading your pages as you contribute public content on Hi Town.
Larger pages are more visible from further away, while smaller pages are more visible when close
